title: Create a PBE account
body: Is it possible for me to create a PBE account? I am level 30 on this account with low reports. If so please tell me how to create a PBE account. Thank you

replies.body:
Hey dude,

Check out [this](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe-signup) link to sign up for the PBE.
Im pretty sure that is only NA accounts, I'm wondering is there anyway to sign up with an OCE account that is lvl 30 and low reports

Ah, my apologies. I thought it was currently open to all regions.

It seems OCE accounts are unable to sign up for the PBE, I'm unsure what the reason for this is. Perhaps because the PBE servers are only in NA, thus having testers on with low ping and who are available during NA 9-5 is preferable.
Yeah I don't know, I will happily play on 200+ ping, at any time
